Package zombicide.grid

Class Board

java.lang.Object
zombicide.grid.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board in Zombicide. It manages the grid cells, survivors, zombies, and other game elements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor for the Board class, initializes the board and sets up the initial configuration.

      Parameters:
      nbLigne - Number of rows on the board.
      nbColonne - Number of columns on the board.
      s - it's an ArrayList of the survivors
